actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to provide a cost of living adjustment for some States to the per capita income used in determining the medicaid matching assistance percentage.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Provides a cost-of-living adjustment for specified States to the per capita income used in determining the medicaid matching assistance percentage under title XIX (Grnats to States for Medical Assistance Programs) of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to provide a cost of living adjustment for some States to the per capita income used in determining the medicaid matching assistance percentage.
